summary: This release adds a proper license, renames Cellar to Amber across the docs, and expands the features of the platform plan. I also added a full test suite for the engine and a guide for publishing with passkey 2FA.

features: rename plan tiers and expand platform plan features
rename Cellar to Amber across documentation
bump engine version to 0.6.2 and publish to npm
docs: add npm publishing guide for passkey 2FA workaround
tests: add comprehensive test coverage for engine modules (#80)
chores: add AGPL-3.0 license and update package.json files
